attributes.action: for mr Sadiq khan to be removed from the postion of lord mayor of london
attributes.additional_details: since sadiq Khan has taken the postion of lord mayor of london, crime  risen and many more crimes have been on the increase  also he seems to have a hate for mr trump even as far as lying saying we the british people do not want him to visit the uk, he not ask every person in the uk this question so he can not say this ,fact most people do not mind if mr trump comes to the uk, also it is the goverments job to decide if mr trump visits  and not mr sadiq Khan and he blames others for his failings
attributes.background: since mr sadiq Khan has taken the postion of lord mayor of london crime rates have risen,he gone as far as saying we the british people do not want mr trump to visit the uk,fact most people do not mind if  trump visits the uk he has done nothing to stop crime from rising in london

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
